title: Construction of light-sensitive Cu2O/Fe2O3 heterostructures to promote photocatalytic CO2 reduction and photo-assisted charge storage
content:
Sustainable Energy Fuels, 2024, Advance Article
DOI: 10.1039/D4SE01038H, Paper
Xiankui Lv, Hongran Yang, Weiting Meng, Muhammad Arif, Xiaobo Feng, Weibin Zhang, Ting Zhu
Heterostructures composed of Cu2O/Fe2O3 3D NAs were prepared to promote performances in photo-assisted supercapacitors and the photocatalytic CO2RR.
To cite this article before page numbers are assigned, use the DOI form of citation above.
